name: Scribble Rush
description:
Originally made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme "Every 10 Seconds." See the Ludum Dare entry here.

Scribble Rush is a party game that has you draw a growingly complex character in thirty seconds. After you're done, go check out the gallery to see what other players have made!

Team:

Ray Hsiao - UI/UX Design & Art

Aidan Strong - Programming & Design

Aaron Isara - Programming & Design
